messages.title: Single Seating: Rows & Columns Now Available
messages.body:
Single-seat layouts now support rows and columns with tag-based placement.

You can automatically place students by tag while keeping a clean row or column structure.

messages.title: Music Suite Now Available ðŸŽ¶
messages.body:
The Music Suite is now available.

Create large ensemble layouts, manage sections, and seat students with more control for band, orchestra, and choir.

messages.title: Full Screen View Feature!
messages.body: Now you can view your seating charts in full screen view - great for displaying a new seating chart on a projector!

messages.title: Live Attendance Chips and Counter
messages.body: You will now see a live count of Student absence, tardy, and left early data on each student card in both Desktop and Mobile.  Additionally, by popular demand, we have now added an unassigned counter for you to use to track any student behavior you need to!
